Package com.google.android.apps.dashclock.api

Class Summary
DashClockExtension Base class for a DashClock extension.
ExtensionData A parcelable, serializable object representing data related to a DashClockExtension that should be shown to the user.
 

Description

This package contains API definitions and base classes for the DashClock extension API. To get started, see the DashClockExtension class documentation.
